com.google.appinventor.client.widgets.properties
Class EditableProperties

java.lang.Object
  com.google.appinventor.client.properties.Properties<EditableProperty>
      com.google.appinventor.client.widgets.properties.EditableProperties
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<EditableProperty>
Direct Known Subclasses:
Settings
public class EditableProperties
extends Properties<EditableProperty>

A collection of properties with associated PropertyEditors.

Interested classes can register listeners to receive events about value changes of any property in the collection.

Constructor Summary
EditableProperties(boolean changeEventOnAdd)
          Creates a new properties collection.

Constructor Detail

EditableProperties

public EditableProperties(boolean changeEventOnAdd)
Creates a new properties collection.

Parameters:

                        String defaultValue,
                        String caption,
                        PropertyEditor editor,

Adds a new property.

Parameters:
name - property name
defaultValue - default value of property
caption - property caption for use in the ui
editor - property editor
type - type of property; see TYPE_* constants in EditableProperty

addProperty

protected void addProperty(EditableProperty property)
Description copied from class: Properties
Adds a new property to the collection. A property of the same name must not already exist.

Overrides:
addProperty in class Properties<EditableProperty>
Parameters:
property - property to be added

Adds a PropertyChangeListener to the listener list.

Parameters:

Parameters:

firePropertyChangeEvent

public void firePropertyChangeEvent(String name,
                                    String newValue)
Triggers a change event to be sent to the listener on the listener list.

Parameters:
name - property name
newValue - new property value

clear

public void clear()
Orphans all properties and then deletes them from this collection.
